TextView.android:text: 1 Nd The shorthand strokes for nd are joined without an angle to form the nd blend, as in signed.
2 Nt The stroke that represents nd also represents nt, as in sent.
3 Ses The sound of ses, as in senses, is represented by joining the two forms of s.
4 Sis, Sus The similar sounds of sis, as in sister, and sus, as in versus, are also represented by joining the two forms of s.
